mapper.insert: INSERT INTO OPER_ORGANIZATION_HIS ( ID, VALID, VCID, FULLADDRESS, ALIAS, REMARK, CODE, TYPE, PARENTID, DISTRICTID, ADDRESS, CHIEFTYPE, NAME, FULLNAME, CHIEFID, COMPANYID ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{valid}, #{vcid}, #{fullAddress}, #{alias}, #{remark}, #{code}, #{type}, #{parentId}, #{districtId}, #{address}, #{chiefType}, #{name}, #{fullName}, #{chiefId}, #{company.id} )

INSERT INTO OPER_ORGANIZATION ( ID, VALID, VCID, FULLADDRESS, ALIAS, REMARK, CODE, TYPE, PARENTID, DISTRICTID, ADDRESS, CHIEFTYPE, NAME, FULLNAME, CHIEFID, COMPANYID ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{valid}, #{vcid}, #{fullAddress}, #{alias}, #{remark}, #{code}, #{type}, #{parentId}, #{districtId}, #{address}, #{chiefType}, #{name}, #{fullName}, #{chiefId}, #{company.id} )
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM OPER_ORGANIZATION WHERE
AND ID = #{id}
mapper.update:
UPDATE OPER_ORGANIZATION TO_
VALID = #{valid,javaType=boolean},
FULLADDRESS = #{fullAddress,javaType=java.lang.String},
ALIAS = #{alias,javaType=java.lang.String},
REMARK = #{remark,javaType=java.lang.String},
CODE = #{code,javaType=java.lang.String},
TYPE = #{type,javaType=com.tx.component.operator.model.OrganizationTypeEnum},
DISTRICTID = #{districtId,javaType=java.lang.String},
ADDRESS = #{address,javaType=java.lang.String},
CHIEFTYPE = #{chiefType,javaType=com.tx.component.operator.model.ChiefTypeEnum},
NAME = #{name,javaType=java.lang.String},
FULLNAME = #{fullName,javaType=java.lang.String},
COMPANYID = #{company.id,javaType=java.lang.String},
CHIEFID = #{chiefId,javaType=java.lang.String},
WHERE TO_.ID = #{id}
